title: Pregnant Marnie Simpson displays her bump in a leopard print bikini as she poses with Casey Johnson
text:
She's heavily pregnant with her first child with former X Factor star boyfriend Casey Johnson.

And Marnie Simpson took to Instagram on Thursday to share a bikini snap of herself alongside her beau to mark one week before she's due to give birth.

Her picture comes just days after the former Geordie Shore star, 27, shared a sizzling throwback image of her pre-baby figure.

Parents-to-be: Marnie Simpson took to Instagram on Thursday to share a bikini snap of herself alongside her beau to mark one week before she's due to give birth

In her latest snap, the reality beauty looked stunning as she flaunted her maternal curves in a tiny leopard print bikini.

Marnie pouted into the camera as she proudly showed off her bump as Casey, 24, tenderly held her stomach.

Sharing an update of her pregnancy journey, Marnie captioned the image: 'OMG. 39 weeks pregnant wtf !!! 1 week (hopefully) and I will become a mother, and @caseycodyj will become a father and we’ll become a family and I’m so freakin excited!!!

'I’m so happy me and casey get to experience this together It’s gonna be so intense, my mind can’t cope with the Emotions it’s so overwhelming. Im so full of love i could burst!!!!

The way she was: Her picture comes just days after the former Geordie Shore star, 27, shared a sizzling throwback image of her pre-baby figure

Pining: Alongside the throwback image of her slender figure in a black crop top and blue, lace knickers, she wrote: '#tb to when I had a waist'

'Roll on the next 7 days baby boy mammy and daddy are ready & waiting, the count down is ONNNN!!!'

Sharing in Marnie and Casey's delight, their showbiz pals were quick to share their support.

Former TOWIE star Nicole Bass shared: 'Soooooo happy for you both.'

While Casay Batchelor wrote: 'Eeeekkkk so so excited for you both. Not long now.'

It comes just days after Marnie shared a throwback image of her slender figure in a black crop top and blue, lace knickers, in which she wrote: '#tb to when I had a waist.'

The star added: 'Forgot what it feels like to not be pregnant.'

The brunette beauty's social media posts comes after she told Celebrity Secrets magazine that she has gone off sex as she enters the last stage of her pregnancy.

Thrilled: She captioned the image: 'OMG. 39 weeks pregnant wtf !!! 1 week (hopefully) and I will become a mother, and @caseycodyj will become a father' (pictured in July 2019)

She told the publication that Casey adores her pregnant figure: 'He loves it – I can’t get him to leave me alone,' but admitted: 'I've gone off sex.'

Although she is not in the mood to be intimate at the moment, Marnie admitted she may change her mind if she is still pregnant past her due date.

She said: 'If I go over my due date we might have to get back in the bedroom to get baby moving.'

Marnie has documented much of her pregnancy on social media and has been candid with her followers on the process.

The reality starlet revealed to her fans that 'watching her body change has been challenging' and that she is 'suffering major anxiety' ahead of the arrival of her baby boy.

Marnie wrote on Instagram: 'Can’t believe I’m almost there, pregnancy has been a experience.

Candid: Marnie's outing comes after she told Celebrity Secrets magazine that she has gone off sex as she enters the last stage of her pregnancy

Detailing the way her figure has changed, she added: 'Watching my body change has been challenging to say the least not going to lie.'

'I’ve started to develop some stretch marks and water retention leaving me with a hell more cellulite than usual, which is daunting but I know it’s going to be so worth it regardless when I see my baby Boy, no pregnancy is perfect.'

She candidly added: 'I’ve felt insecure, tired, hormonal and over all c**p, social media only sees the ups never the downs! Which is frustrating but I wanna keep it real for all the other mammas out there!!!

'I’m also suffering with major anxiety daily about the birth and the aftermath, especially with all my previous bladder trouble I’m just so scared of the unknown, I’m so grateful for all the messages I get daily it literally keeps me going and calms me down to know there is so many of us all feeling the same.'

Finishing with a message of encouragement to any of her followers who may be pregnant, she wrote: 'We got this girlies #pregnancy #32weeks #babyboy.'

Marnie announced that she was expecting her first child with her Ex On The Beach partner back in April and later revealed she was expecting a boy at a gender reveal party.
description: Marnie Simpson, 27, took to Instagram on Thursday to share a bikini snap of herself alongside her beau Casey Johnson, 24, to mark one week before she's due to give birth.
